sources.title: 1956 - The Unguarded Moment - Sombras en la noche - Harry Keller - VOSE

metadata.Plot: A woman has recently been murdered. A teacher at the nearby high school receives threatening notes from a student. Detective Graham is the only one who believes that she is in danger. She fingers the boy, a popular student. Her teaching career is threatened, as is her life. The detective looks for evidence, and brings him in on burglary and murder charges. Both crimes are solved.
metadata.Writer: Herb Meadow, Lawrence B. Marcus, Rosalind Russell
metadata.Actors: Esther Williams, George Nader, John Saxon
